full_summary:
================================

### EZ899-240733 - Drainage Improvements

#### Tender Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS4234001903 |
| **Publication Date** | September 28, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | October 13, 2023 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Procurement Category** | CNST (Construction) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Selective Tendering |

#### Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit an application to provide construction services for the Drainage Improvements project. The project involves installation of pipe culverts, excavation/ditching and riprap end protection, placement of grout in abandoned previously used CSP culverts, and hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas along the Alaska Highway between Fort St. John and Fort Nelson, British Columbia.

#### Key Details

* **Expected Contract Dates**: None (Please contact the Contracting Authority for more information)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: British Columbia, Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Tender Requirements

The selection criteria for this tender is based on the lowest price. Interested contractors must demonstrate their capability and experience in providing construction services for projects of similar scope and scale.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents are available online through the Ariba Discovery platform. Interested contractors can access the documents by visiting the following URL:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17578815?extsite=MTc1Nzg4MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Important Note

The tender closing date is October 13, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. It is the responsibility of the interested contractor to ensure timely submission of their application.
